subject: URGENT CONFIRMATION OF YOUR FU
body:
URGENT CONFIRMATION OF YOUR FUNDS 
This is to inform you that your ATM card worth $12,000,000,000,00USD has been delaying for long time because 
the activation fee which is $50 dollars you have not send so I will advise you to go and send the needed fee through Itunes card or Google play gift card and get back to me together with the payment slip of the Itunes card or Google play gift card 
that you buy to enable the delivery of your ATM card worth $12 millions of DOLLARS to be delivered you immediately so your urgent respond needed now GOD BLESS YOU.
Yours Faithfully,
MR.NATHANIEL DOUGLAS
The President and CEO.
Head Office Location Address: 200 Bay Street,
Bank Plaza,
Toronto, ON, C, M5J 2J5.
just buy the itunes card or google play gift card and attached it to my email address to enable your ATM card to be delivered to you today
YOUR $12,000,000,000,00USD IS READY CONTACT THIS EMAIL (
dhlkoreacompany@zohomail.com

subject: Re: URGENT CONFIRMATION OF YOUR FU
body:
Hello Douglas,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about the ATM card worth millions of dollars! That's quite a surprise.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain why an activation fee is needed? And why specifically through Itunes card or Google play gift card? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Annie
